hasAttributes.name: businessProcessMajor
hasAttributes.description:
The major class of transaction associated
with a business process (for example,
sales).

hasAttributes.name: businessProcessMinor
hasAttributes.description:
A subprocess of the major business
process (for example‚Äîorders, returns,
discounts, and so on).

hasAttributes.name: erpSubledgerModule
hasAttributes.description: Description of the subledger or ERP module the journal entry originated from. Should tie back to a system or significant accounting process. In some instances, may be represented by source.

hasAttributes.name: sourceDescription
hasAttributes.description: A plain English description of the source. Some of the more common journals are purchases, sales, cash receipts, cash disbursements, and general journal.

hasAttributes.name: sourceId
hasAttributes.description: Posting source (code for source from which the journal entry originated, such as sales journal, cash receipts journal, general journal, payroll journal, accountant manual entry, spreadsheet, and so on).

hasAttributes.name: systemManualIdentifier
hasAttributes.description: Define if the source creates system-generated or manually entered journal entries
